title: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach - Juventus
snippet: Juventus Football Club announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.

title: Igor Tudor renews! - Juventus
snippet: Itâ€™s now official: Tudor has renewed his contract with Juventus. The Croatian coach will lead the Men's First Team until 30 June, 2027, with an option to extend by another year until 30 June, 2028.

title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.

title: Igor Tudor sacked by Juventus after seven months in charge - The Athletic
snippet: Igor Tudor has been dismissed as Juventus head coach after 24 games in charge.

title: Juventus sack coach Igor Tudor after seven months in charge - ESPN
snippet: Slumping Juventus fired coach Igor Tudor on Monday following three straight losses and an eight-match winless run.
